text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: 『Power』. The ultimate Joker.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
However, this is only the case if you can transcend logic and theory. 
With only a half-baked power, you'd be nothing but a pierrot.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: As such――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Can't you at least handle a light warm up? 
Your pace is dropping.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Didn't you put this together? 
On your own, this menu.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: 『Quite the commendable spirit』
choice_data_list: 『I swear it on my trainer badge!』
『I swear it on my trainer badge!』

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: 『……in that case, why don't you show me what you can do?』

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Or is this just an appeal to show how 『Serious』 you are?

At those words, I shook my head, still moving 
my muscles desperately. Wrong, that was――

This was a training menu I put together for myself as if I was 
the trainee Uma Musume. ……Of course, adjusted to human specs.
choice_data_list: This is so I can stand beside you!
This is so I can stand beside you!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Heh……I see.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: If that's the case, it's not enough, you know.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Yes. After all, if you only train a normal 
amount, you'd just become a Macho Pierrot.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
If you want to add the ultimate Joker to your hand, 
then you need to let go of all logic and reason.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
It'll be fine. I'll show you how to let go of all that. 
From now on, I'll show you, step by step……right?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
First――Squats. Let's work on your form. Your core, and weight 
distribution. All of that will be the source of your power.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Why are you gawking? 
Hurry up and get in to stance.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Set your feet shoulder width apart and slowly lower 
your hips. Keep your upper body straight, and don't 
let your knees go further forward than your toes――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Now stop and hold that position for 10 seconds. 
Just 10 seconds, it's simple right? Alright……ready, go!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
1! 2! 3! 4! 5! 6! 7! 8! 
……Your hips, and chin, stop raising them! ……8・9・10!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Next, on to the second set. This time, if 
your form crumbles, the count won't proceed.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ready, go!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
See? If you keep taking it easy, 
this will never end, you know?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Good enough. 
Well then――One more set.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Okay, a 3 minute break.

The moment she said 『Break』, I collapsed on the floor. 
I tried to rehydrate, and I could barely breathe.
(Beep beep beep beep!)

Three minutes was over in the blink of an eye. My breathing 
was still heavy, and my entire body was screaming to stop――but.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara, you can still stand?
choice_data_list: Not yet! I can keep going……!

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……Heh. 
…………Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, color me surprised. 
……To think you've still got plenty of 『Leeway』.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
You'll have to pardon me. 
Now I understand the situation.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Now, shall we continue? 
……this time, 『For real』.
――I don't recall much after that.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Stop stumbling about, it's unsightly. 
You're like a newborn deer. I fear for the future.

Before I realized it, it was over and we were walking around 
outside. But, now I just needed to make it back to the academy――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara? That's……

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu……this profound glimmer. Such high quality that 
can be seen even through this showcase. As expected――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: A super high quality iron weight.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
On top of that, 『Super Heavy class』 but still this 
compact. Seems useful for carrying around too.

……there were many things I wanted to tsukkomi about. 
There were, but more than that――
choice_data_list: Y-you're going to carry that around……?
Y-you're going to carry that around……?

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Yes. 
Like a walking dumbbell

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Not at all. It's quite good. 
Besides――

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
It has a 『Carrying Case』. 
So there are great merits to choosing this one.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: ……Look. It's wrapped in lace, so it's quite cute.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
If you want to increase the weight even further, 
there are even these weighted charms. Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
……Ara? 
This leather case, I wonder if it's a new color.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm……Hey. Could you take out this item? 
Yes. That brand new one.

It was a shocking difference from her previously 
Spartan attitude……though, it made sense, I guess.

If you carried around your own muscle training goods, 
it might make it more fun to work out.

Thinking that, I tried reaching my hand out to the 
『Super Heavy Class Iron Weight』 that had caught her eye but……

Heavy, it was too heavy……! It wasn't realistic 
at all for me to carry around something like this.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: Ara……Ho ho ho.

text_block_list.name: Gentildonna
text_block_list.text: It's way too early for you to use that, rookie-san.

But someday I'll be able to take it. 
While vowing that, I purchased my own, lighter one.
